# Aufgabe

Kann man die Anzahl gerade verliehener Fahrräder eines entsprechenden Anbieters anhand der Temperatur vorhersagen?

In dieser Übung untersuchen wir diese Frage.

Sie können die Daten von der [Webseite der UCI](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Bike+Sharing+Dataset#) herunterladen.

Wir beziehen uns auf den Datensatz `day`.

Berechnen Sie einen Entscheidungsbaum  mit der Anzahl der aktuell vermieteten Räder als AV und der aktuellen Temperatur als UV!

Tunen Sie den Cp-Parameter des Baumes; lassen Sie sich 20 Tuningparameter vorschlagen.

Geben Sie den MSE an!

[Hinweise](https://datenwerk.netlify.app/Hinweise.html)




</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_c5df57f46ed6415dca5170c6ef1ed94b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_2b132b925acf289f3573633bf3897cf0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d <- read.csv("/Users/sebastiansaueruser/datasets/Bike-Sharing-Dataset/day.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_6e17f4875ed6b50fb52574e5accf66b6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(d)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Columns: 16
```

:::
:::


## Data split


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_33ae989cfbe94dc1655b1d8fbc979583'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
d_split <- initial_split(d, strata = cnt)

d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::




## Define recipe


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_8aeeb0495ad3d066b9e6c42dc534b24c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec1 <- 
  recipe(cnt ~ temp, data = d)
```
:::




## Define model



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_1bfb65ef5e570a0cba31c74d0126b7d3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <-
  decision_tree(cost_complexity = tune(),
                mode = "regression")
```
:::



## Tuning grid



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_b05d93ef28a147ffb323c8a58d863faa'}

```{.r .cell-code}
grid <-
  grid_regular(cost_complexity(), levels = 20)
grid
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 20 × 1
   cost_complexity
             <dbl>
 1        1   e-10
 2        2.98e-10
 3        8.86e-10
 4        2.64e- 9
 5        7.85e- 9
 6        2.34e- 8
 7        6.95e- 8
 8        2.07e- 7
 9        6.16e- 7
10        1.83e- 6
11        5.46e- 6
12        1.62e- 5
13        4.83e- 5
14        1.44e- 4
15        4.28e- 4
16        1.27e- 3
17        3.79e- 3
18        1.13e- 2
19        3.36e- 2
20        1   e- 1
```
:::
:::


Alternativ:


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_9f4abdee7255189dd9114313f7d1af18'}

```{.r .cell-code}
grid <-
  grid_regular(extract_parameter_set_dials(m1), levels = 20)
grid
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 20 × 1
   cost_complexity
             <dbl>
 1        1   e-10
 2        2.98e-10
 3        8.86e-10

 6        2.34e- 8
 7        6.95e- 8

```
:::
:::



## Define Resamples


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_0db5d613c092b216dda157e5517f7ba4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rsmpl <- vfold_cv(d_train)
```
:::



## Workflow



::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_c7bc2f9b4db627f0b67ae62638d5f036'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(m1) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec1) 
```
:::




## Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_d037d9c103a21b66c96e854759dc4f04'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tic()
fit1 <- tune_grid(
  object = wf1, 
  resamples = rsmpl)
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
9.019 sec elapsed
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
fit1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# Tuning results
# 10-fold cross-validation

10 <split [493/54]> Fold10 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
```
:::
:::



## Bester Kandidat


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_0fc7eff401d9900aa1f331a0d1e000bf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
show_best(fit1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 5 × 7
  cost_complexity .metric .estimator  mean     n std_err .config              
            <dbl> <chr>   <chr>      <dbl> <int>   <dbl> <chr>
```

:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_44a00582d73ea1db8a1e7d3b1c7dfe9d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1_best <-
  wf1 %>% 
  finalize_workflow(parameters = select_best(fit1))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```
:::
:::



## Last Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_74b4b403c2c5900ba725652933008aa3'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample <- last_fit(wf1_best, d_split)
```
:::




## Model performance (metrics) in test set


::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_a523936a993c0778bab0413266b4f2d6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard    1430.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.473 Preprocessor1_Model1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike03_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-16_ba37f19e51ba5bd5da3287174c46b1d9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
MSE <- fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics() %>% pluck(3, 1)
MSE
```

```
[1] 1430.304
```
:::
:::
